name: serverest-ui-e2e-test-automation
description: Automação de testes E2E para ServeRest UI

scripts.allure:clean: rm -rf allure-results allure-report || rmdir /s /q allure-results allure-report
scripts.api:all: npm run allure:clean && CYPRESS_TEST_TYPE=api cypress run --browser chrome --headless --spec "cypress/e2e/api/**/*.cy.js" && npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
scripts.ui:chrome:headless: npm run allure:clean && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --spec "cypress/e2e/ui/**/*.cy.js" && npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
scripts.ui:chrome:headed: npm run allure:clean && cypress run --browser chrome --headed --spec "cypress/e2e/ui/**/*.cy.js" && npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
scripts.ui:firefox:headless: npm run allure:clean && cypress run --browser firefox --headless --spec "cypress/e2e/ui/**/*.cy.js" && npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
scripts.ui:firefox:headed: npm run allure:clean && cypress run --browser firefox --headed --spec "cypress/e2e/ui/**/*.cy.js" && npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
